definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: understanding De 32:28 + 27 t.; sf. [[תְּבוּנׇתִי]] Pr 5:1 + 7 t.; [[תובנתו]] Job 26:12 Kt (Qr [[תְּבוּנׇתוֹ]]); [[תְּבוּנׇם]] Ho 13:2 for [[תְּבוּנׇתָם]] v. De Ps 27:5; [[תְּבוּנׇוֹת]] Ps 49:4 + 4t.; [[תְּבוּנוֹתֵיכֶם]] Job 32:11; —

the faculty Ex 31:3, Ex 35:31, Ex 36:1 (P) De 32:28 (poet.) Job 12:12, Job 12:13, Pr 2:6, Pr 2:11, Pr 28:16, Is 44:19; [[אִישׁ תְּבוּנׇה]] Pr 10:23, Pr 15:21, Pr 17:27, Pr 20:5; [[אִישׁ תְּבוּנוֹת]] Pr 11:12 (= Ob:Ob 8 where [[אישׁ]] omitted by scribal error); [[דֶּרֶח תְּבוּנׇה]] Is 40:14.

the object of knowledge Pr 2:3, Pr 3:13, Pr 5:1, Pr 14:29, Pr 18:2, Pr 19:8, Ps 49:4, Ps 147:5, Is 40:28, 1Ki 5:9, 1Ki 7:14; [[תטה לבך לתבונה]] incline thy mind to understanding Pr 2:2; reasons Job 32:11.
